org.openadaptor.core.exception
Class MessageException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      org.openadaptor.core.exception.MessageException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class MessageException
extends java.lang.Throwable

Used in Response, RuntimeExceptions thrown from calls to IDataProcessor.process(Object) are wrapped in this class with the argument to the call.

Author:
perryj
